Title: Requires fire-resistant material applicators to undergo training and register with the office of fire prevention and control
Summary: Requires fire-resistant material applicators to undergo training and register with the office of fire prevention and control; imposes fines for violations.
LawCode: Amd ยง155-a, add ยง159-b, Exec L
ActClause: AN ACT to amend the executive law, in relation to fire-resistant material applicator training and registration
